name: Rolling Combine
description:
Combine Fruits and get score in this mass physics 3d Game!

In Rolling Fruits, you combine 2 same fruits for next bigger one.
You can use this unique physics in game to combine same fruits!
Make the Biggest Fruits and fill the jar as much as you can in this 3d environment!

Game Mode

Classic
Combine Fruits for gather score! Be careful not to overload the jar!

Timer
Fruits will make time for you! But how long you will hold for? It’s done when time is over.
